meanings.sent1: The storm caused unmitigated damage to the town.
meanings.sent2: Her unmitigated joy was evident in her wide smile.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigated chaos in the kitchen made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unmitigated determination was like a force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigated beauty of the sunset took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: The unmitigated heat of the desert was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: His unmitigated loyalty to his friends never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigated noise of the city kept her up all night.
meanings.sent4: The unmitigated flow of the river was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigated pain in her ankle made her limp.

meanings.sent1: Her unmitigated support for the cause never faltered.
meanings.sent2: The unmitigated trust he had in her was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigated laughter of the children filled the room.
meanings.sent4: His unmitigated honesty was refreshing in a world of lies.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigated success of the project surprised everyone.
